CHAPTER EIGHT

[REID]67-reid

CHAPTER FIFTEEN

[LINA]94-lina

CHAPTER TWENTY - SIX

[LINA]95-lina

[I]0-i stretch out on the couch , planting [my]0-i feet in [Denny]95-lina ’s lap . “ Hey , ”[2094-he] [he]2094-he says , with mock annoyance . Or maybe it ’s a little bit real annoyance . The cost of [[my]2094-he company]2792-my company is expensive . ”[2094-he] Honestly , [I]0-i was the one who suggested [he]2094-he play a game . ABOUT LAURELIN PAIGE]2562-stella gray cd reiss jenna scott raven jayne jd hawkins poppy dunne lia hunt sadie black about laurelin paige

With millions of books sold , [Laurelin Paige]59-laurelin paige is the NY Times , Wall Street Journal , and USA Today Bestselling [Author of the Fixed Trilogy]2563-author of the fixed trilogy . [She]59-laurelin paige 's [a sucker for a good romance]2564-a sucker for a good romance and gets giddy anytime there 's kissing , much to the embarrassment of [[her]59-laurelin paige three daughters]2565-her three daughters . [[Her]59-laurelin paige husband]727-her husband does n't seem to complain , however . When [she]59-laurelin paige is n't reading or writing sexy stories , [she]59-laurelin paige 's probably singing , watching shows like Billions and HGTV design competitions or dreaming of [Michael Fassbender]242-michael fassbender .
